thread.section_title: KT Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KT Performance | ktperformance.net | 2 of 33
thread.title: Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text:
Out of all the lying a***oles I had to deal with to get the parts I needed to do
My rebuild, these guys were straight forward and very on the level like everyone else should've been. They were great!!! Easy, no problems, parts were good. I even got a tshirt and swag which I will wear while giving the bird to all the other vendors I had to deal with. I recommend them to everybody!
